data.meta_site_name: Christopher Horn Obituary | August 2, 2024 | Stone Funeral Home, Inc. - Boyne City, MI
data.text:
Christopher Horn, age 46, of Boyne City, Michigan died unexpectedly in his home on August 2nd, 2024.

Chris was born June 13th, 1978, to Winfield and Mary Jane (McBunch) Horn, III. He grew up in Texas and moved to Boyne City in 2010.

On July 13th, 2013, he married Andrea Lynne Murray in Boyne City where they had currently lived.

Chris was known to be selfless and was always there with a helping hand. Chris also loved being a grandpa and the “fun” uncle.

Chris loved metal fabrication and was most proud of his custom Rat Rods he built. He won several awards and trophies for his creations.

Chris is survived by his wife, Andrea Horn, and his children: Jenna Murray of Boyne City, Caitlin Sulak (Layne Peshaba) of Boyne City, Austin Horn, Abigail Horn and Anna Horn of Palacios, Texas. He had 3 grandchildren: Kaleb Murray and Addison Peshaba of Boyne City and Gracelyn Horn of Palacios, Texas. His brother Daniel (Diane) Horn of Aransas, Texas, his sister Amber (Joey)Baucom of Azel, Texas and his favorite aunt Lorrie (Steve) Pemble of Ponder, Texas.

Chris was preceded in death by both of his parents and his brother, John Horn.

A Celebration of Life will be hosted by his family on Saturday, August 17th, 2024, at 326 Collings Street in Boyne City from 3pm-6pm.

Arrangements are in the care of Stackus Funeral Home.
